title: 'Creative' font id
content:
can anyone tell me what font this is? Ta very much

author: mrpink

comments.content:
Eclat by Doyald Young.  
 [http://www.linotype.com/148404/eclat-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203205458/http:/www.linotype.com/148404/eclat-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/148404/eclat-family.html")

(well actually, there’s another ’takeoff’ of Eclat — I think this is it)

\> (well actually, there’s another ’takeoff’ of Eclat — I think this is it)

i was going to link to Creampuff — but I wasn’t sure about the backstory and didn’t  
want to link to something without knowing the background. :)

I’ll go with Creampuff

Thanks everyone
